languages.text: Суровые чистки способствуют порядку в колонии, но отпугивают некоторых торговцев и истощают человеческие ресурсы мира.
The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.
languages.original_text: Суровые чистки способствуют порядку в колонии, но отпугивают некоторых торговцев и истощают человеческие ресурсы мира.

traits.locale_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.
The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.
The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.
The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.
The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.

languages.text: Las duras purgas traen orden a la colonia, pero espantan a algunos comerciantes y agotan los recursos humanos del planeta.
languages.original_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.

traits.locale_text: Las duras purgas traen orden a la colonia, pero espantan a algunos comerciantes y agotan los recursos humanos del planeta.

languages.text: Les violentes purges ont rétabli l'ordre dans la colonie, mais elles ont aussi fait fuir des marchands et réduit le nombre d'actifs.
languages.original_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.

traits.locale_text: Les violentes purges ont rétabli l'ordre dans la colonie, mais elles ont aussi fait fuir des marchands et réduit le nombre d'actifs.

languages.text: 严酷的清洗整肃了殖民地的秩序，却吓跑了不少商人，还令这个世界的人口大量减员。
languages.original_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.

traits.locale_text: 严酷的清洗整肃了殖民地的秩序，却吓跑了不少商人，还令这个世界的人口大量减员。

languages.text: 苛酷な粛清は植民地に秩序をもたらしたが、一部の貿易商を脅かし、惑星の人的資源を枯渇させた。
languages.original_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.

traits.locale_text: 苛酷な粛清は植民地に秩序をもたらしたが、一部の貿易商を脅かし、惑星の人的資源を枯渇させた。

languages.text: Die brutalen Säuberungen sorgen zwar für Ordnung in der Kolonie, schrecken aber einige Händler ab und vernichten einiges an Humankapital.
languages.original_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.

traits.locale_text: Die brutalen Säuberungen sorgen zwar für Ordnung in der Kolonie, schrecken aber einige Händler ab und vernichten einiges an Humankapital.

languages.text: Sıkı tasfiye sürecinin ardından kolonide düzen kurulsa da durum, kimi tacirleri ürkütüyor ve dünyadaki insan kaynaklarını tüketiyor.
languages.original_text: The harsh purges bring order to the colony but scare away some traders and deplete the world's human resources.
